name: site_boundary
description: Brep of the building site boundary

name: building proximity to site edge
description: Offset from site boundary, representing building footprint

name: f2f_height
description: Floor to floor height in the building

name: Office
description: The dedicated floor area to a specific building function

name: Toiltet_Office_(example)
description: A connectivity relationship between toilets and offices, every space does not need this relationship defined, default is arbitrary connectivity

name: degree_of_alignment
description: A value describing how aligned the structural system is with the zone config.

name: degree_of_regularity
description: A value describing how regular the structural system is

name: max_span
description: The maximum allowable span for beams and slabs

name: Extraordinary_load
description: A load that cannot be inferred from typology, or location

name: Slab_span
description: Describing the load transfering slab type

name: Beam_supports
description: Type of support for the beams in the structural system

name: Office_population
description: The number of users in offices

name: Office_daylight
description: Need for daylight in office spaces

name: illuminance_south
description: Availiable illuminance on the south facing facade elements

name: Solar_radiation_south
description: Available solar radiation on the south facing facade elements
